name: Recipe by API-Ninjas
description: Search over 200,000 creative recipes. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/recipe.

api_methods.name: /v1/recipe
api_methods.description: Get a list of recipes for a given search query. Returns at most 10 results. To access more than the first 10 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.
